Package model

Class CalendarService

java.lang.Object
model.CalendarService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICalendarService
public class CalendarService extends Object implements ICalendarService
Provides services for managing events in a calendar model.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Method Details

    • addSingleEvent

      public void addSingleEvent(String subject, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String description, String location, boolean isPublic, boolean autoDecline) throws InvalidDateException, EventConflictException
      Adds a single event to the calendar.
      Specified by:
      addSingleEvent in interface ICalendarService
      Parameters:
      subject - The event title
      start - The start date-time
      end - The end date-time
      description - The event description
      location - The event location
      isPublic - Whether the event is public
      autoDecline - Whether to auto-decline conflicts
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - If the dates are invalid
      EventConflictException - If there’s a conflict and auto-decline is enabled

    • addRecurringEvent

      public void addRecurringEvent(String subject, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String description, String location, boolean isPublic, Set<DayOfWeek> recurrenceDays, int occurrenceCount, LocalDate recurrenceEndDate, boolean autoDecline) throws InvalidDateException, EventConflictException
      Adds a recurring event to the calendar.
      Specified by:
      addRecurringEvent in interface ICalendarService
      Parameters:
      subject - The event title
      start - The start date-time of the first occurrence
      end - The end date-time of each occurrence
      description - The event description
      location - The event location
      isPublic - Whether the event is public
      recurrenceDays - The days of the week the event repeats on
      occurrenceCount - The number of occurrences (-1 for indefinite)
      recurrenceEndDate - The end date of the recurrence (null for no end)
      autoDecline - Whether to auto-decline conflicts
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - If the dates are invalid
      EventConflictException - If there’s a conflict and auto-decline is enabled

      Returns:

      public boolean isBusyAt(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Checks if the calendar is busy at a specific time.
      Specified by:
      isBusyAt in interface ICalendarService
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The time to check
      Returns:

    • editEvent

      public void editEvent(String subject, LocalDateTime from, String property, String newValue, ICalendarService.EditMode mode) throws Exception
      Edits an event’s property based on the specified mode.
      Specified by:
      editEvent in interface ICalendarService
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject of the event to edit
      from - The start time for editing (null for ALL mode)
      property - The property to change
      newValue - The new value for the property
      mode - The edit mode (SINGLE, FROM, ALL)
      Throws:
      Exception - If the edit fails

    • exportTo

      public String exportTo(String format, String path) throws IOException
      Exports the calendar to a CSV file.
      Specified by:
      exportTo in interface ICalendarService
      Parameters:
      format - The export format (currently only "csv" is supported)
      path - The file path to export to
      Returns:
      The path where the file was saved
      Throws:
      IOException - If the export fails
